description: 18 pages, saddle-stapled; two-color offset cardstock covers; red and black on white publication with 'La Policia De Arte' lettered across the top; lettered down the left side of the front cover: 'All Death Issue'; 'Art Police' down right side; image in center of man putting toothpaste on toothbrush
title: La Policia De Arte, Vol.20, No.2  "All Death Issue"
